Posts.Content: Jul 19, 2008 04:32PM saintlucie wrote: My surgeon said, this might hurt a little and then yanked it out.  It had been in for 7 days and had not had much drainage for three, but it was a holiday weekend.  It was the most painful thing I have ever experienced, so much that I screamed out in pain.  I wanted to cry like a baby.  I could not believe that she did not numb it or anything.  Even when I think back on that moment, I cringe.
Posts.Title: drain in armpit Passenger59 mason204
